channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Engineering Lifecycle Optimization Publishing
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Engineering Lifecycle Optimization Publishing

item.title: CVE-2021-39019|2024-09-17T00:06:28.385Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization - Publishing 6.0.6, 6.0.6.1, 7.0, 7.0.1, and 7.0.2 could disclose highly sensitive information through an HTTP GET request to an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 213728.

item.title: CVE-2023-45188|2024-06-10T13:29:49.600Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization Publishing 7.0.2 and 7.03 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions. By sending a specially crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system. IBM X-Force ID: 268751.

item.title: CVE-2023-45188|2024-08-02T20:14:19.731Z -- ibm -- engineering%20lifecycle%20optimization%20publishing
item.description: IBM Engineering Lifecycle Optimization Publishing 7.0.2 and 7.03 could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions. By sending a specially crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable system. IBM X-Force ID: 268751.
